description:
Bucciarati accepts Giorno`s resolve to join Passione and has him take the test to get into the gang. The one giving the test is one of Passione`s capos, Polpo, and he`s currently in prison. Polpo gives Giorno a lit lighter and tells him to make sure that flame doesn`t go out for 24 hours. However while he`s taking the test, Koichi appears before him, looking for his passport.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hei no Naka no Gang ni Ae
Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall
塀の中のギャングに会え
